ingredients.content: 4 fresh mint leaves, plus 4 sprigs to garnish
6 oz cream of coconut (e.g., Coco Lopez)
fresh pineapple, cut into triangles, to garnish

preparations.content: Place sugar and mint leaves into mixing bowl and grind <b>15 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add rum, pineapple juice, cream of coconut and lime juice and blend <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add 12 oz ice and blend <b>20 sec/speed 10<b>.
Pour Pina Colada mixture into each glass. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail umbrellas and serve.
